thread.title: LinkedIn revamps mobile app, rolls out recruiting tools
thread.title_full: LinkedIn revamps mobile app, rolls out recruiting tools - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: LinkedIn revamps mobile app, rolls out recruiting tools
text:
Photo: Liz Hafalia, The Chronicle LinkedIn executives Joff Redfern (left) and Hemendra Kumar introduce the company’s new products. LinkedIn executives Joff Redfern (left) and Hemendra Kumar...
LinkedIn on Wednesday previewed a redesigned mobile app for its users, and other products designed for corporate recruiters. LinkedIn executives Joff Redfern (left) and Hemendra Kumar introduce the company’s new products. LinkedIn executives Joff Redfern (left) and Hemendra Kumar...
LinkedIn on Wednesday previewed a redesigned mobile app for its users, and other products designed for corporate recruiters.
